name: Gor Rubenyan
bio: I specialize in building high-quality web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Redux Toolkit, Next.js, Vite and Tailwind CSS. I create modern, responsive and user-friendly interfaces that deliver an exceptional digital experience.
aboutText: I am a Front-end developer with over one year of hands-on experience, specializing in React, Next.js and modern web technologies. I enjoy building intuitive, efficient and accessible user interfaces.
aboutText2: Through study and practical work I focus on writing clean, maintainable code and following industry best practices.
projectsPortfolio: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, featuring dark mode, multilingual support and smooth animations.
projectsTask: A comprehensive task-management application with real-time updates, user authentication and intuitive drag-and-drop functionality.
projectsEcommerce: A full-featured e-commerce platform with payment integration, inventory management and a modern shopping experience.
workText: During the stated period I worked as a Front-end developer and also taught various groups, delivering an individualized approach to each student.
contactText: I am open to new collaborations and interesting projects. Feel free to contact me to discuss opportunities or just to say hello.
